RB1-Prototype

The first fully autonomous weeding robot. Making farming more cost efficient. And better for the environment.

Request Info

Robot

Built for precision spot spraying.

Weed Detection AI

Computer Vision. Powerfull and embedded into the device. No need for cloud connectivity.

Crop Row Detection

Automatically detects Crops. This way Navigation is possible even offline and without extensive mapping.

Spot Spraying

Saving up to 80% of herbicide whilst application.
